overview: Fantasia in Best Show Minor is the first and only ever Best Show on WFMU DVD Release! It features stuff youâ€™re never going to believe, puppets. animation, sketches, travelogues from callers, and guest appearances from Patton Oswalt, Ted Leo, Paul F. Tompkins, Zach Galifinakis, Fucked Up, Tim and Eric, John Hodgeman, Aimee Mann, Scharpling and Wurster, Yo La Tengo, Kurt Vile, Matt Fracton, Todd Barry, and Jason Woliner. tagline: The Best Show on WFMU 2010 Marathon DVD!
title: Fantasia in Best Show Minor
